title: YYST Magnetic Drink Holder Beer and Cup Holder for Grills,Refrigerator, Tractor, Tool Box - Keep Your Favorite Beverage at Hand
features: Magnetic Cup Holder- The Cup Holder allows you to keep you favorite beverage conveniently in reach. Perfect for the car, garage, workshop, office, camp site, boat, and more! No Drinks. No yeti coolders.
80 MM (3.15") Diameter - Suitable for your drinks (cups , water bottles, cans, beers, etc) hold cups or cans up to 3.15"(80MM) diameter.

Sturdy and Convenient - The powerful magnets attract to any ferrous metal flat surface (not for curved metal surface) including toolbox, filing cabinets, grills, refrigerator, metal shelf , tractor, and heavy machinery. Not suitable for aluminum surface or stainless steel surface.
Foldable and Easy to Carry - The cup drink holder is foldable when not in use. Take little space in your backpack. You can carry it without taking too much space in your bag.
No Scratches - The magnets on the cup holder are covered with rubber. No scratches to the surface.
description: Attention: Powerful magnets attaches to any ferrous surface , such as tool box, refrigerator ,filing cabinets, grills ,or tractor, heavy machinery and equipment- Don't attach to stainless steel surface or aluminum surface , or plastic surface.  Various Usage - Use on the refrigerator , boat , tractor , office room, garage ,workshop, etc.  No scratches to the surface - The magnets are covered with rubber - No scratches . keeps your drink (or a multitude of items) close at hand doesn't shift or move at all. Deep Enough - 90MM (3.5 Inches) Deep. Your beverage containers don't fall out.  Foldable - Space saving - Flip it closed when not in use.  Magnetic Cup Holder allows you to keep your favorite beverage at hand, whether in the garage, workshop, office, outdoors and more!
